subject: Baseball
Music
lead_paragraph: Mike Castellani, the “audio engineer” for the Mets since 1994, and others discuss the work and thought that go into that snippet of music that accompanies a player to the plate or pitcher’s mound.
snippet: Mike Castellani, the “audio engineer” for the Mets since 1994, and others discuss the work and thought that go into that snippet of music that accompanies a player to the plate or pitcher’s mound.
